Already posted here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5131889/%5BPC_ENG___x32%5D_VRay_1.5_SP3_for_3DS_Max_2010

"This is buggy crack it's work all the time for someone and for someone do not work"

I think this is happening to those that tried to install others versions of VRAY without success. So complete remove any installation of VRAY,  use CCLEANER and clean registry, manually find any related vray reference in registry (run regedit) and delete all of them.

Update 3DS Max 2010 here:

http://usa.autodesk.com/adsk/servlet/ps/dl/index?siteID=123112&id=2334435&linkID=9241178

Autodesk 3ds Max 2010 Service Pack 1
and
Hotfix - Autodesk速 3ds Max速 2010 - 2009.09.22

Now try a clean install of VRAY 1.5 SP3a to 3DS Max 2010 following installation steps.

Just FYI, this crack worked for me.

I didn't read the comments about it being bullshit until about half-way through the VRAY install and got all disappointed. I finished it, and tried it out anyway to see if there was a watermark and what would you know, no watermark. :D and fully featured!

So if you want VRAY, you apparently have a 50/50 install chance. Follow the instructions exactly and pray.
